ti:translation.ti:label: The Lives of the Ten Orators
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Moralia, Vol. X. Fowler, Harold North, translator. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press; London: William Heinemann Ltd., 1936 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: Lives of the Ten Orators
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. V. Goodwin, William W., editor; Barcroft, Charles, translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company; Cambridge: Press of John Wilson and Son, 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Περὶ τῶν δέκα ἡτόρων
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol. V. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner, 1893.
